committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the National Trails System Act to provide for a study of El Camino Real Para Los Texas (The Royal Road for the Texas), and for other purposes.
short_title: El Camino Real Para Los Texas Study Act of 1993

summary.text: El Camino Real Para Los Texas Study Act of 1993 - Amends the National Trails System Act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the El Camino Real Para Los Texas for designation as a national scenic trail. Requires the study to be done in cooperation with the Mexican government and to provide for necessary technical assistance with the possible objective of establishing an international historic trail.

titles.title: El Camino Real Para Los Texas Study Act of 1993
To amend the National Trails System Act to provide for a study of El Camino Real Para Los Texas (The Royal Road for the Texas), and for other purposes.
